text: yar nam vetavacanankalai nirakarikkirarkalo, avarkalai nam niccayamaka narakattil pukutti vituvom;. Avarkal tolkal karukivitum potellam avaiyalla (veru) tolkalai, avarkal vetanaiyaip (puranamaka) anupavippatarkena, avarkalukku nam marrik konte iruppom - niccayamaka allah mikaittavanakavum nanamullavanakavum irukkinran
